item.title: Scala for Angry Beginners: From Frustration to Functional
item.description: Scala can feel intimidating sometimes especially if you come from languages like Python. I have been writing code in Python, SQL and Julia for the past 5 years but last year when I decided to pick up Scala I personally haven’t struggled because I’m familiar with functional languages (I actually wrote my first lines of code in Haskell).
